name: prompthub-enterprise
description: Enterprise-grade prompt management and collaboration platform

scripts.test:services: [ -f services/package.json ] && (cd services && npm run test:all) || echo 'No service package'
scripts.lint:services: [ -f services/package.json ] && (cd services && npm run lint:all) || echo 'No service package'
scripts.lint:services:fix: [ -f services/package.json ] && (cd services && npm run lint:all:fix) || echo 'No service package'
scripts.postinstall: [ -f services/package.json ] && (cd services && npm install) || echo 'No service package'
scripts.clean: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.reset: npm run down:volumes && npm run clean && npm run dev

author: PromptHub Enterprise Team

hooks.pre-push: npm run test && npm run lint
